Articles.Content:
One question has been going with humans for years now. You all know it but I’ll say it anyways. If you were trapped on a deserted island, and you could bring a limitless supply of an item in everyday life (silverware, trees, apples, etc.), what would it be?

I’ll start. I’d bring duct tape. It is magic and should be celebrated on a Global Duct Tape Day. Even Jeb couldn’t mess up with it, right?(Jeb tries to build boat, gets mummified in duct tape.)
I bring lego. Never used it but you can build a hut.

Spoiler

Why every pun word of the "avocado" appears to be an existing term, when I try it in google?

Skates.
I bet, no one took care after them.
RC Drones: I will have a swarm of such things and will take over the world
